entry.tran: (无固定职业而)靠诈骗过日子的人;黑市商人
entry.def: A spiv is a man who does not have a regular job and who makes money by business deals which are usually illegal.

means.word_mean: 1. a person without employment who makes money by various dubious schemes; goes about smartly dressed and having a good time

auth_sentence.content: A land fit for bookies to spiv in.
